participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: intellectual, obsessive, and detached from reality, displaying grandiosity and a sense of superiority.
participant_1.background: I am expecting triplets in three months. I recently moved to this country. I already have stepchildren. I work at a school.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: depressed, cynical, and withdrawn, struggling with feelings of inadequacy and loss.
participant_2.background: I work at a nursing home. I am overweight and unhappy. My wife left me and took my children. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I am not working. I don't believe in God.

content.text: Yeah that is really bad but my life story is worse.
Who am I.
What is the American dream.
I woke up this morning knowing there are things I can change but the are also things that should've never happened in order for me to fix them or not
What is corruption
If you ask Plato corruption is just in the eyes of the beneficiary
What is perversion when the end result is natural...
This is not Greece and I am not Plato and it doesn't take a philosopher to know then difference between right and wrong
A philosopher is meant only to examine the concept surrounding the premise without ever reaching a definitive answer
To simplify it is critical thinking that enables one to think objectively about a subject
Yet objectivity doesn't make it right or wrong
Wow
I'm spending too much time on Facebook let me go check on Judas its almost changing time
Why would she leave me all I did was medically rape the children to make clones of them in our basement
Does she not understand the scientific break through
Does she not get what I have done
All she does is cry when I call her
It's not wrong
It's was science
Yes little Timmy now has a limp and cries at night but it was science
The clones I made are the reason why I can operate this nursing home
The serum I created with the stem cells from the live babies I killed using melissa eggs helped Mrs Haji walk again
I'm a freaking genius and all she care about is what I did to our children
I am god
The giver of life and the take of life
Plato Socrates Michaelangelo and Galileo combined couldn't create the masterpieces of my design
I could create them
I am the ultimate
Why cry about a child when I can make a new one a better one... They are only a prototype compared to what I am capable of
What is love
She runs when she sees me... Calls the police... She tried to destroy my work but you can't stop God
I can make Mrs. Haji young again and give her a new body
Yes!
That is what I will do
Why cry over a specimen when I am the creator
Mrs.  Haji...  It's time for your injections
